text: The mayor of Dharan is the head of the municipal executive of Dharan. The role was created in 1958. The current mayor is Harka Raj Rai who was elected in the 2022 election. The position has been held by six people. The city of Dharan is governed by the Dharan Sub-Metropolitan City Council. The mayor is supported by the municipal executives. ==References== Category:Mayors Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Mayor of Dharan
